item.title: Introducing the tuftesque blogdown theme
item.description: It‚Äôs grown slowly into its own overOur blog‚Äôs theme started as ‚Äòhugo-tufte‚Äô but has overtime been customized to the point it‚Äôs distinctly different. I‚Äôve been asked to put it up as a standalone theme for other to use, here it is! This post will serve as a quick tutorial getting you from nothing to a customized blogdown blog using the theme built for this blog: tuftesque. It doesn‚Äôt cover the more standard details such as writing new posts as I feel those have been covered much better than I could here.

item.title: useR!2017 digressions
item.description: We both recently attended useR!2017 in Brussels. It was a blast to say the least. We‚Äôre going to tag team to cover our favorite things & the lessons we learned while adventuring across the Atlantic. Location Lucy: Brussels was incredible.
